data.text:
In the Heart of the Country

Coetzee, J. M.

Published by Secker & Warburg, London, 1977

ISBN 10: 0436256703 / ISBN 13: 9780436256707

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Quantity: 1 available

Hardcover. Condition: Fair. Dust Jacket Condition: Fair. 1st Edition. 139 pages (complete). J M Coetzee's second novel. First edition. Ex-library copy (Cape Town Region) with consequent residue, debris, labels, annotations, marks, wear. The dustjacket is mild; it has a clear plastic protective cover that is scuffed and worn. The dustjacket is secure and whole. The board covers have shelf wear to the edges. The spine titling is bright and smart. Inside, aside from the expected library consequences the initial pages have handling marks and very mild foxing. The pages are clean, clear, comfortable, serene, sure and certain. fk. Our orders are shipped using tracked courier delivery services. Seller Inventory # avee

Contact seller

Hardcover. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Fair. 1st Edition. the jacket is edge worn. very rubbed and marked and there are damp stains beneath the jacket which are invisible when the jacket is on. small tears and fraying and a very small hole on the spine. the book has a previous owner's signature and old tape residue marks on the end pages and under the boards. a small stain on the side block.the binding is excellent. Our orders are shipped using tracked courier delivery services. Seller Inventory # ojiq
